titles.title: American Royalties Too Act of 2018
A bill to amend title 17, United States Code, to secure the rights of visual artists to copyright, to provide for resale royalties, and for other purposes.
American Royalties Too Act of 2018

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
American Royalties Too Act of 2018
This bill creates a right under copyright entitling artists to a royalty for the sale of their works of visual art, if the work was sold in an auction by someone other than the artist.
